author: TravisEz13
body:
Add two new named release builds that produce zip files with symbols.
update the infrastructure to support these builds.
Add a readme to describe how to use the release builds.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: This is needed to finish high-priority work.  I will merge when tests finish.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: rebased so I can test with other changes.

title: Add release builds that produce symbols for compliance scans
